<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Healing Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=689) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 223 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Champion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=4)

**Prerequisites**
[Champion Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=686)

</column>

---

You gain the appropriate devotion spell for your [cause](/classes/champion/causes) ([_lay on hands_](/Spells.aspx?ID=395) for the paladin, redeemer, and liberator). If you don’t already have one, you gain a focus pool of 1 Focus Point, which you can Refocus by praying or serving your deity.
